entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.6°C
